title: Adult Film Star Ron Jeremy Indicted on More Than 30 Counts of Sexual Assault
sub_head: The charges, which date back to 1996, involve more than 21 women and girls
body:
Adult film star Ron Jeremy has been indicted on more than 30 sexual-assault counts involving 21 women and girls over two decades, the Los Angeles County District Attorney said Wednesday.
The 68-year-old actor, whose given name is Ron Jeremy Hyatt, pleaded not guilty.
In a grand jury indictment unsealed Wednesday, Mr. Hyatt was charged with 12 counts of forcible rape, seven counts of forcible oral copulation, six counts of sexual battery by restraint, four counts of sexual penetration by a foreign object, two counts of sexual penetration of an unconscious or asleep person, and one count each of a lewd act upon a child under the age of 14 or 15, and sodomy by use of force and assault with intent to commit rape.
The indictment replaces an earlier criminal complaint.
The charges date back to October 1996, when Mr. Hyatt is accused of raping a 19-year-old woman during a photo shoot. The alleged victims range in age from 15 to 51 years old.
